text: Isipian ingangarimɨn garir gumazir kuraba faragha Israelian gumazir maba, men apengan ingangarimɨn garir gumaziba me amɨsefe. Egha datɨrɨghɨn me me bagha ghua, puv me mɨsogha me mɨgɨa ghaze, “Manmaghsuavɨra ia datɨrɨghɨn ingarizir brighɨn dɨbobonim, ia faragha ingarizɨ dɨbobonimɨn mɨn otozir puvatɨ?”
